price: И би речено: „Уђи у Рај!“ - А он рече: “Камо среће да народ мој зна,
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
